name: TKSmartCardUserInteractionForPINOperation
desc: A representation of user interaction for secure PIN operations on a Smart Card reader.

items.name: var pinCompletion: TKSmartCardUserInteractionForPINOperation.Completion
items.desc: The conditions under which PIN entry should be considered complete.

items.name: var pinMessageIndices: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: A list of message indices referring to a predefined message table, used to specify the type and number of messages displayed during the PIN operation. nil by default.

items.name: var locale: Locale!
items.desc: The locale for the displayed messages. If nil, the userâ€™s current locale is used. By default, this value is the current locale of the system.

items.name: var resultData: Data?
items.desc: The returned data without SW1-SW2 bytes, if any.
